summary: THE ECM WAS REPLACED TWICE.  THE REPLACEMENT FAILED BEFORE THE VEHICLE  MADE IT OUT OF THE SERVICE PARKING LOT AND THE IGNITION COILS WERE REPLACED TWICE, 4 WERE REPLACED THE FIRST TIME, THEN TWO ON THE SECOND.  THE CHECK ENGINE LIGHT ILLUMINATED REPEATEDLY, AND DEMONSTRATED A LOSS OF POWER/ROUGH RIDE.  SCC     *JB
